title: Hollow Font Style
content:
Hi, I was wondering how do I turn a regular bold font into a hollow font where all you see is the outline of the text as pictured in my text, I use adobe photoshop cs6 and I often wonder how its done or if its a technique used elsewhere.

Thank you.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Hollow font style.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160857/http:/typophile.com/files/Hollow%20font%20style.png) | 48.24 KB |
author: auroraspirit

comments.content: Select the letterform(s) and then delete fill and use Stroke for your outline selection.

Hi, thanks for your reply I attempted to delete the text it came up with an error I'll need to find a youtube video, good to know its possible.

Thank you :)
You need to flatten text before delete - make it into pixels.
